sdo:itemDesc.dc:title: Handwritten letter from Schenker to Carl Lafite (Gesellschaft der Musik), dated September 16, 1912
sdo:itemDesc.dc:description: Schenker declines Lafite's invitation to discuss in person the topic, date and fee of his proposed lectures to the Society, and asks him to put suggestions in writing.
sdo:itemDesc.dc:subject: Thema; topic; Datum; date; Honorar; honorarium; fee; Vorschläge; proposals; Ansichten; opinions

tei:div.tei:p: I have just received, late this afternoon, your kind invitation regarding a discussion of the "topic, date, and honorarium," —to my way of thinking, a few days late in view of the newspaper notice that appeared yesterday! Permit me the liberty of asking you kindly to take into account the enormous backlog of my work and to let me have your proposals, opinions, etc. in writing. It is surely in the interests of both sides that the matter be dealt with as soon as possible.
